title: Cozy Cabin
summary: A warm wooden cabin perfect for mountain getaways. Includes fireplace, balcony, and beautiful forest views.

host.bio: I love to chat about health, well-being, and personal development. I learned herbal medicine this year and enjoy sharing knowledge.

title: Beach Bungalow
summary: A bright seaside bungalow just steps from the Mediterranean. Perfect for sun lovers and nightlife explorers.

host.bio: Traveling is my passion, and I love capturing moments through my lens. When I'm not behind the camera, you can find me exploring new cultures and cuisines.

summary: Minimalist high-rise loft with city views, steps from restaurants and transit.
